overview:
Stephen Kruger heads Interactive Buzz, LLC. to be best in class for Social Media Activation and Outreach via Word-of-Mouth Marketing.

Managing a team of experienced professionals within the space of Social Media Activation. Spectrum of offerings in addition to Word-of-Mouth Marketing includes Branded Assets, such as Widgets, Social Network Profiles, and Mobile Marketing. Prior Clients and Campaigns included Entertainment (NBC, DISNEY, SCRIPPS NETWORK, PEOPLE’S CHOICE AWARDS, CBS); Consumer Packaged Goods (P&G, PRINGLES); Automotive (TOYOTA, YARIS CAMPAIGN); Publishing (CONDE NAST PUBLICATIONS), Software (MICROSOFT), and PSA (AD COUNCIL).

Interactive Buzz, LLC. T: 818.761.6517 www.InteractiveBuzz.com
